description:
On their day off, Dino goes to the park with Maika and the dog, Owner. The time he spends with Maika is like a dream, while Owner falls in love with another dog. Meanwhile, at Café Stile, Kaho is extremely depressed after accidentally deleting all the data from her favorite video game. Akizuki makes things worse with his usual lack of delicacy, but then tries to console Kaho.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good at Tsundere, Bad at Cornering
Tsundere : parfait, plaquage au mur : nul !
Tsundere Jouzu, Kabe Don wa Heta
ツンデレ上手, 壁ドンは下手
